original_text: You are to give them the firstfruits of your grain, new wine and olive oil, and the first wool from the shearing of your sheep,
korean_text: 또 네가 처음 거둔 곡식과 포도주와 기름과 네가 처음 깎은 양털을 네가 그에게 줄 것이니

sentences.original_text: You are to give them the firstfruits of your grain
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 너의 곡물의 첫 소산을 그들에게 줄 것이요

sentences.original_text: and the first wool from the shearing of your sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 네 양의 털 깎는 첫羊毛을 주라
